noWallet: No Binance Smart Chain wallet found
wrongNetwork: You are on the wrong network
installWeb3MobileBrowser: Please visit us from a web3-enabled mobile browser such as Trust Wallet or Coinbase Wallet.
installMetamask: Please visit us after installing Metamask on Chrome or Brave.
betaWarning: This project is in beta. Use at your own risk.
searchOrPaste: Search Token Name, Symbol, or Address
unknownError: Oops! An unknown error occurred. Please refresh the page, or visit from another browser or device.

noRecipient: Enter a wallet address to send to.
invalidRecipient: Please enter a valid wallet address recipient.
mustBeETH: One of the input must be BNB.
enterCurrencyOrLabelCont: Enter a {{ inputCurrency }} or {{ label }} value to continue.
totalSupplyIs: Current total supply of liquidity tokens is
youAreSettingExRate: You are setting the initial exchange rate to
totalSupplyIs0: Current total supply of liquidity tokens is 0.
tokenWorth: At current exchange rate, each pool token is worth
firstLiquidity: You are the first person to add liquidity!
initialExchangeRate: The initial exchange rate will be set based on your deposits. Please make sure that your BNB and {{ label }} deposits have the same fiat value.
enterLabelCont: Enter a {{ label }} value to continue.
label: Label
name: Name
enterTokenCont: Enter a token address to continue
toleranceExplanation: Lowering this limit decreases your risk of frontrunning. However, this makes more likely that your transaction will fail due to normal price movements.
wrapBTYFirst: Please wrap BTY to WBTY before swapping to ERC20 tokens
wrapBTYSteps: Swap steps: 1. First swap BTY to WBTY. 2. Then swap WBTY to target token.
youAreFirstLiquidityProvider: You are the first liquidity provider.
ratioTokensSetPrice: The ratio of tokens you add will set the price of this pool.
onceHappyRateClickSupply: Once you are happy with the rate click supply to review.
addLiquidityToReceiveLP: Add liquidity to receive LP tokens
whenAddLiquidityGivenPoolTokens: When you add liquidity, you are given pool tokens that represent your share. If you don't see a pool you joined in this list, try importing a pool below.
connectWalletViewLiquidity: Connect to a wallet to view your liquidity.
dontSeePoolJoined: Don't see a pool you joined?
orIfStakedLPUnstake: Or, if you staked your LP tokens in a farm, unstake them to see them here.
anyoneCanCreateBEP20: Anyone can create a BEP20 token on BSC with any name, including creating fake versions of existing tokens and tokens that claim to represent projects that do not have a token.
interfaceCanLoadArbitraryTokens: This interface can load arbitrary tokens by token addresses. Please take extra caution and do your research when interacting with arbitrary BEP20 tokens.
ifPurchaseArbitraryToken: If you purchase an arbitrary token, you may be unable to sell it back.
findTokenSearching: Find a token by searching for its name or symbol or by pasting its address below.
theseTokensCommonlyPaired: These tokens are commonly paired with other tokens.
transactionRevertLargePriceMovement: Your transaction will revert if there is a large, unfavorable price movement before it is confirmed.
differenceMarketPriceEstimated: The difference between the market price and estimated price due to trade size.
differenceMarketPriceYourPrice: The difference between the market price and your price due to trade size.
eachTradeFeePaid: For each trade a 0.2% fee is paid. 0.17% goes to liquidity providers and 0.03% goes to the PancakeSwap treasury.
routingThroughTokensBestPrice: Routing through these tokens resulted in the best price for your trade.
tokenListsOpenSpecification: Token lists are an open specification for lists of BEP20 tokens. You can use any token list by entering its URL below. Beware that third party token lists can contain fake or malicious BEP20 tokens.
useToolFindPairs: Use this tool to find pairs that do not automatically appear in the interface.
whenAddLiquidityGivenTokens: When you add liquidity, you are given pool tokens representing your position. These tokens automatically earn fees proportional to your share of the pool, and can be redeemed at any time.
removingPoolTokensConverts: Removing pool tokens converts your position back into underlying tokens at the current rate, proportional to your share of the pool. Accrued fees are included in the amounts you receive.
transactionRevertPending: Your transaction will revert if it is pending for more than this long.
transactionRevertPriceChange: Your transaction will revert if the price changes unfavorably by more than this percentage.
lockDescription: Securely lock your tokens or liquidity tokens
allLocksComingSoon: All locks feature is under development, please check My Locks first
amountGreaterThanZero: Amount must be greater than zero
unlockDateFuture: Unlock date must be in the future
tgeDateFuture: TGE date must be in the future
sumTgeCycleBpsError: Sum of TGE and cycle basis points cannot exceed 100%
connectWalletViewLocks: Please connect wallet to view your locks
enterTokenOrLpAddress: Enter token or LP token contract address
lockWarning: Please exclude BTYLock's lockup address 0x6a70D3A891bA8471A1cc18380B579B73D9503e21 from fees, rewards, max tx amount to start locking tokens. We don't support rebase tokens.
ownerAddressNote: The address you input here will receive the tokens once they are unlocked
manageERC20OnBTYChain: Manage your ERC20 tokens on BTY Chain
deployYourOwnERC20: Deploy your own ERC20 token contract on BTY Chain
initialSupplyDesc: Enter the total number of tokens you want to issue (e.g.: 500000000 means 500 million tokens)
supportMintable: Support minting (can increase token supply after deployment)
forbiddenTokensList: BTC, ETH, BNB, BTY, USDT, USDC, DAI, CAKE, WBTC, WETH, WBTY and other mainstream tokens
